titles.title: To provide duty-free privileges to participants in, and other individuals associated with, the 1994 World Rowing Championships.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/2/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment, through October 30, 1994 to the personal effects of participants in, and other individuals and equipment associated with, the 1994 World Rowing Championships.
